nodes.text: A clone trooper served under Commander Cody during the Clone Wars. Around 21 BBY, he was part of the team sent to rescue Jedi Master Even Piell, who was being held captive in the Citadel on the Separatist-held world of Lola Sayu.
As a clone of Jango Fett this clone stood at 1.83 Imperial standard meters.
This trooper utilized white Phase I clone trooper armor, a standard DC-15S, and a Backpack.
In the episode, the clone was voiced by Dee Bradley Baker, who voices all clone troopers through the series.
